events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department as a software developer role, matching your experience.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your profile and will be reaching out soon to guide you through the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview was completed successfully, and your technical skills and experience align well with our role requirements.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming your availability for the next steps in the recruitment process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 10 AM UTC with our senior engineering team.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 18th at 2 PM UTC to discuss your fit within the company culture.
Your HR interview went well, and you expressed strong alignment with our company values and team environment.
We have sent you an official job offer for the Software Engineer position, including details on compensation and benefits.
We appreciate your positive feedback regarding the offer and your enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
You have formally accepted the job offer, and we are excited to welcome you on board as part of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has officially begun, including orientation sessions and access to company resources and tools.
The recruitment process is now complete. You have been successfully hired as a Software Engineer, and we look forward to your contributions.
